ygData.subject: Update on spell changes in new patch !
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoowww ! I was in my solo mode before patch and it was realy risky some time to get a mob down i used nearly 4 bubles of mana for any fight. I have int 150
ygData.messageBody:
Whoowww !

I was in my solo mode before patch and it was realy risky some time to get
a mob down i used nearly 4 bubles of mana for any fight. I have int 150 and
+70 mana in items lv 21. my tactic was Cast titan clash to stum cast a
force shock to do damage and then ROOT guy. cast flame shock, flame shock
(root if necesary) force shock, and finish it with a flames. It was dead
time betwen two force shocks that i have time to cast in midle 2 flame
shocks and i have to wait a bit before start casting a force shock.

Now I can nearly cast 2 force shocks one after another. i use force, flame
force now and it is much faster damage delivery !!

Bad thing is that when i soloed this birds a 17 lv enchanter was near me
and he soloed them too ! ! He used all mana it is true and was with int 165
and some mana items but i can say he was KILLING same guys as i 21 lv wiz i
was feel pissed a little.

Any idea how to make my casting serie more eficent in mana or time consuming?



Silverion Dragonirder

High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard

moderator mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com
